column.name: soundingid
column.comment: autoincrement field we will use to identify records

column.name: idflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate if id is WMO,WBAN or other

column.name: dateflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate what type of date is being used

column.name: instr_add
column.comment: instrument type, from extra data w/ code = 106, from on29

column.name: track
column.comment: tracking technique , from extra data w/ code = 106, from on29

column.name: vrsnsrc
column.comment: source version number of the format 1.00
